title: I am Your Sister: Season 2
description: At 21 years old, Symone Holmes has finally transitioned into the second phase of her life, adulthood. As the WNBA’s top prospect, she is ready to start living her dreams without delay. However, her mother's continued disapproval of her sexuality still casts a dark shadow over Symone's spirit. When an unexpected family tragedy occurs, will Symone choose to put her plans of stardom on hold to go through the obstacle that has kept her fenced out of her mother's life? Can past hurts be forgiven or will traveling back in time reopen old wounds? Symone Holmes returns in this emotional tale of sacrifice and family tragedy that dramatically changes the course of the ‘second season’ of her life.
author: Ericka K.F. Simpson
